file_content.text: It's not over. Keep fighting.
Stay on Taris, and you'll share Bashun's fate!
Watch this. [Kill Bashun]
That'll send those beasts running off-planet.
Use your last breath to save your followers. Make them leave Taris, or we'll kill them all.
Tell the Cathar to surrender.
I suppose there must be another planet they can call home.
Fellow settlers--the Empire's won. Lay down your weapons, leave Taris while you still can. I'm sorry I've failed you.
They better run fast. I'll kill every straggler I find.
Now why don't you come over here, let me out. I'm sure there's some way I can make it up to you.
You've been caged too long.
My pleasure. [Open her cell]
But first, I could use a hand over here. Let me out... please.
Stay in there awhile. Think about that attitude of yours.
No. You need a time-out.
I'm going to escape. And when I do, you better be long gone!
Since you asked nicely.
Sure thing. [Open her cell]
Ah! Much better.
Blasted Morgukai. Jumped me when I had Bashun pinned down.
A real fighter would have sensed an ambush, and defeated them.
That's no excuse.
You'd be locked up too if I hadn't reached the Cathar first.
Better get your facts straight before reporting to Lord Gravus.
Rehearsing your story?
I answer to no one!
I can think of a few ways you can repay me.
[Flirt] I deserve thanks.
Ha! I don't owe you anything.
Show some gratitude.
No one's ever earned my thanks. Least of all you.
Now--there's Republic blood to spill. I'd tell you to back off, but you'll just follow me anyway.
See you on the battlefield.
The Empire's trying to drive us from Taris--from our homes. Soon they'll learn that Cathar never back down!
Keep talking, Bashun. When I get out of here, I'll stomp out your entire species!
The Empire sent this Sith to kill me, but she failed--proof that none can defeat the mighty Cathar!
Thana's weak. I'll show you the real strength of the dark side.
It's time you face true power.
Stinking Sith. Glad you could join my trap.
Thana lacks finesse. I'm here to finish the kill.
I'll prove that theory wrong.
So the Empire's sending its top agents against me. Good.
I've killed plenty of Cathar. You'll die just like the rest.
Sounds like a challenge.
I'm more than you can handle. And I'm not alone.
Surrender, Bashun.
The Empire just doesn't know when to quit.
I was afraid I'd never see you again.
[Flirt] Miss me, Thana?
What are you talking about? Just get me out of here!
The only way you're leaving is in Republic custody.
Are all Cathar this arrogant?
More company? Wait until the Republic hears about this.
You know, Cathar aren't the only settlers on Taris. The Nikto have joined us, along with their Morgukai warriors.
We're all refugees, fleeing the Empire's cruelty. And I promise you, my Cathar--we won't be uprooted again!
Nice speech. Uplifting, really. But they'll be disappointed when I kill you.
You're giving them false hope.
Don't be so sure. I have the Morgukai, and the Republic, on my side.
Any home you make here will be wiped out by the Empire.
Staying on Taris is suicide.
The Republic will shield us. As long as they hold Taris, we'll fight to defend it.
Think again. [Attack]
Watch closely, fellow Cathar. Witness our enemy's downfall!
